# ================== AID Specific ==================
# State files (contain session-specific data)
.aid/state.json
.aid/context.json

# Test outputs (generated by agent tests)
.aid/test-outputs/
.aid/agent-tests/

# QA review files (generated during development)
.aid/qa/*-review-*.json

# Keep templates and example files
!.aid/qa/EXAMPLE-TASK.yaml
